name: Sniper Shooter 3d games
description:
Sniper Shooter 3d games

Sniper Shooter 3d game is a first-person 3D shooter game. You will play as a sniper, strike terrorists. Your task is to fight against terrorists bases and destroy City terrorist remnants, to effectively combat terrorist activities.

The game has many weapons to choose: Deagle, M4A1, AWP, AW50, AS50, Bomb, Medical Kit.

As a commando, you need a great courage in the face of the fierce enemy.

Play the game with real physics and amazing 3D graphics.
Lively Environment will drive you crazy and make you addictive to Kill Shot sniper game!!
Enjoy hunting the multiple targets shooting all the enemies out there.

Key Features :

=> Realistic combat experience, rich combat action and combat sound
=> Easy to control
=> Awesome 3D graphics
=> Sniper scope view
=> Enjoy realistic gun simulation and animation!
